statements: SELECT * FROM TeamTrainingMaterials
SELECT material_name, resource_url FROM TeamTrainingMaterials
SELECT id, material_name, resource_url FROM TeamTrainingMaterials WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM TeamTrainingMaterials WHERE team_member_id = 3
SELECT material_name, team_member_id FROM TeamTrainingMaterials ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT * FROM TeamTrainingMaterials WHERE id = 1
SELECT material_name FROM TeamTrainingMaterials WHERE team_member_id = 3 ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT id, material_name, team_member_id FROM TeamTrainingMaterials WHERE material_name LIKE 'Java%' ORDER BY team_member_id ASC
SELECT id, resource_url FROM TeamTrainingMaterials WHERE team_member_id IN (2, 4, 6) AND material_name LIKE '%programming%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM TeamTrainingMaterials WHERE team_member_id = 5
SELECT leader_name, team_name FROM team_leaders
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials
SELECT leader_name, team_name, material_name FROM team_leaders, training_materials
SELECT * FROM team_leaders WHERE leader_id = 1
SELECT material_name FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM team_leaders ORDER BY leader_id DESC;
SELECT leader_name, team_name FROM team_leaders WHERE team_name = 'Engineering';
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT t.leader_name, tm.material_name FROM team_leaders t JOIN training_materials tm ON t.leader_id = tm.uploader_id;
SELECT leader_name, COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM team_leaders t JOIN training_materials tm ON t.leader_id = tm.uploader_id GROUP BY leader_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_description, upload_date FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, upload_date, material_id, material_description FROM training_materials;
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT member_id, member_name, member_email, member_role FROM team_members;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, upload_date, resource_link FROM team_resources;
SELECT * FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id > 10 AND material_id < 20;
SELECT material_name, upload_date FROM training_materials WHERE material_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Manager' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM team_resources ORDER BY upload_date LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM virtual_team_leaders;
SELECT name, email FROM virtual_team_leaders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT material_name, description FROM training_materials WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, team_id FROM team_members WHERE join_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT resource_name, link FROM team_resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_team_leaders;
SELECT name, email FROM virtual_team_leaders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT material_name, description FROM training_materials ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT team_id, member_name FROM team_members WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resource_name, link FROM team_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Documentation';
SELECT * FROM TeamLeaders;
SELECT name, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM TrainingMaterials ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrainingResources WHERE id = 3;
SELECT team_id, training_material_id, training_resource_id FROM TeamTraining WHERE team_id = 2 ORDER BY training_material_id;
SELECT * FROM TeamLeaders;
SELECT name, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM TrainingMaterials WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT team_id, training_material_id, training_resource_id FROM TeamTraining WHERE team_id = 2 AND training_material_id = 4 AND training_resource_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers JOIN TeamTraining ON TeamMembers.id = TeamTraining.team_id WHERE TeamMembers.name = 'Alice' AND TeamTraining.training_material_id = 3;
